metadata.name: It Will Be Special.
metadata.description:
It Will Be Special Understanding Signals From Each Other, Being Interconnected.

HORSE EMOTIONS by Frank Gude is an awe-inspiring project that takes you on a journey of thoughts and feelings through unique expressions. 

As an artist, Frank Gude has dedicated six years to painting the world of horses, immersing himself in the circle of life.

Through the project "Horse Emotions," Gude has created a captivating collection of 123 unique items:

8 stunning sculptures  
35 breathtaking acrylic paintings  
48 exquisite gouache paintings  
14 masterful watercolor paintings

Furthermore, the entire project is divided into different editions, each containing limited artwork, ensuring that every piece of art is highly unique.
